title: Low-fat stir-fried squid with sweet chilli noodles

ingredients.item: 400g squid tubes, thawed if frozen, cut into 5mm-wide rings
2 tbsp Blue Dragon Hot Sweet Chilli Sauce

instructions.step: Place the noodles in a large heatproof bowl, cover with a kettleful of boiling water and leave to soak for 15 minutes. Drain and cool.
Heat 1 tsp of the oil in a large wok. Pat the squid dry with kitchen paper and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until cooked through. Transfer to a bowl and return the wok to the heat.
Heat the remaining oil in the wok and stir-fry the garlic and sugar snaps for 2 minutes.

Return the squid to the pan along with the noodles, beansprouts and salad onions and heat through for a couple of minutes until piping hot. Season with sweet chilli sauce and lime juice then divide between 4 bowls and serve scattered with basil leaves.
